org.deeplearning4j.optimize.api

Interface ConvexOptimizer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseOptimizer, ConjugateGradient, GradientAscent, IterationGradientDescent, LBFGS, StochasticHessianFree

    public interface ConvexOptimizer
extends java.io.Serializable
    Convex optimizer.
